article.Heading: Budget 2016 India: Nifty above 7050, Sensex over 100 pts post FM's Budget speech
article.Summary: ICICI Bank, Tata Steel, Reliance, SBI and Dr Reddy's Labs in the Sensex. ITC, Maruti, Wipro, Cipla and NTPC are down.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol Bureau

The market has done a U-turn, recovering its losses during the Budget speech. The Sensex is up 167.11 points or 0.7 percent at 23321.41, and the Nifty is up 54.85 points or 0.8 percent at 7084.60. About 1079 shares have advanced, 1179 shares declined, and 141 shares are unchanged.

ICICI Bank, Tata Steel, Reliance, SBI and Dr Reddy's Labs in the Sensex. ITC, Maruti, Wipro, Cipla and NTPC are down.

Focus on enhancing expenditure in priority areas of - farm and rural sector, social sector, infrastructure sector employment generation and recapitalisation of the banks are most of the priorities of the  government.
